fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Traditional
- Each Property is named after a word, and when bought, that word becomes Trademarked. Whenever any player pays rent on a non-Trademark Property, if that Property's post in <#1171963193749426196> contains the Trademarked word, a % of the rent goes to the Trademark Owner.
- The % is equal to 3% for each Trademark Property that the Trademarked word's owner has. Owning the full Set will dpuble that %.
- Only instances of the exact spelling of the Word count as being Trademark.
- If there are less than three non-Trademark Properties that have the Trademarked Word, reroll the Trademark Property.
